QuestData.Title: A Challenge From Our Enemies
QuestData.Description: Make no mistake. This message cannot be taken lightly. Any threat made against our people will be dealt with swiftly.$B$BWe must travel to the estate at once to discover what has become of Ly'leth.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Andaris at the Lunastre Estate in Suramar City.
QuestData.RewardText: The withered... defeated so easily.$B$BWe must find a way to negate the magic of the felborne. We cannot afford to fight if our own can be turned against us.
